short.ar: شد محركاتك وتسابق نحو الانتصار في لعبة محاكاة سباق الكارتينغ! العديد من خيارات التخصيص والسرعة والمرح بانتظارك.
short.am: ከተፈላጊዎችና ታሪካዎች ጋር የምትገመት እና የጥቅም ጉዳይን ይጫኑ! ቡናዶሽን, ፍቅርና ባህል ያላቸውን የተስማማል ምስል ለመስጠት በተለያዩት ቦታዎች እናግባብ.
short.bg: Включете двигателите си и се състезавайте за победата в Картинг Симулатор! Персонализация, скорост и забавление ви очакват.
short.bn: কাস্টমাইজেশন, গতি, এবং মজা নিন কার্ট রেসিং সিমুলেটরে! আপনার ইঞ্জিন চালান এবং বিজয়ের দিকে দ্রুত চলে যান।
short.ca: Posa't al volant i correr cap a la victòria al Simulador de Curses de Cartròdrom! Personalització, velocitat i diversió et esperen.
short.cs: Našlápněte na plyn a závoděte k vítězství ve hře Simulátor závodu na kartu! Přizpůsobení, rychlost a zábava na vás čekají.
short.da: Tænd for motorerne og race mod sejr i Kart Racing Simulator! Tilpasning, hastighed og sjov venter på dig.
short.de: Starte deine Motoren und rase zum Sieg im Kart Racing Simulator! Anpassung, Geschwindigkeit und Spaß erwarten dich.
short.el: Στρίψτε τους κινητήρες σας και αγωνιστείτε για τη νίκη στο Kart Racing Simulator! Η προσαρμογή, η ταχύτητα και η διασκέδαση σας…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US: Rev your engines and race to victory in Kart Racing Simulator! Customization, speed, and fun await you.
short.es,es_419: ¡Arranca tus motores y corre hacia la victoria en Kart Racing Simulator! Personalización, velocidad y diversión te esperan.
short.et: Käivitage oma mootorid ja võidusõit võidusõidul Kartingusimulaatoris! Kohandamine, kiirus ja lõbu ootavad teid.
short.fa: موتورهای خود را روشن کنید و در بازی شبیه‌ساز مسابقه کارتینگ به سوی پیروزی بدوید! سفارشی‌سازی، سرعت و سرگرمی منتظر شما هستند.
short.fi: Käynnistä moottorisi ja kilpaile voitosta Kart Racing Simulatorissa! Mukautus, nopeus ja hauskuus odottavat sinua.
short.fil: Paandarin ang iyong mga makina at magkarera tungo sa tagumpay sa Kart Racing Simulator! Pagpapalit-anyo, bilis, at kaligayahan ang…
short.fr: Mettez les gaz et foncez vers la victoire dans Kart Racing Simulator ! Personnalisation, vitesse et amusement vous attendent.
short.gu: આપના ઇન્જિન ચાલાવો અને કાર્ટ રેસિંગ સિમ્યુલેટરમાં વિજયી બનવા માટે દૌડો! વૈવિધ્યપૂર્ણતા, ગતિ અને આનંદ તમારી માટે ઉપલબ્ધ છે.
short.he: הדליקו את המנועים שלכם ורוממו למרוץ לניצחון ב-Simulator Racing Simulator! התאמה אישית, מהירות וכיף מחכים לכם.
short.hi: अपने इंजन को चालाएं और Kart Racing Simulator में विजय प्राप्त करने के लिए दौड़ें! कस्टमाइजेशन, गति, और मजा आपका इंतजार कर रहे हैं।
short.hr: Uključite svoje motore i utrkujte se prema pobjedi u Kart Racing Simulatoru! Prilagodba, brzina i zabava čekaju vas.
short.hu: Indítsd el a motorokat és versenyezz a győzelemért a Kart Racing Simulatorban! Testreszabás, sebesség és szórakozás vár rád.
short.id: Nyalakan mesin Anda dan balapan menuju kemenangan di Kart Racing Simulator! Kustomisasi, kecepatan, dan kesenangan menanti Anda.
short.it: Accelera i tuoi motori e gareggia per la vittoria in Kart Racing Simulator! Personalizzazione, velocità e divertimento ti aspettano.
short.ja: エンジンを吹かせてカートレーシングシミュレーターで勝利に向かってレース！カスタマイズ、スピード、楽しみが待っています。
short.kn: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಎಂಜಿನ್‌ಗಳನ್ನು ಪ್ರಾರಂಭಿಸಿ ಮತ್ತು ಕಾರ್ಟ್ ರೇಸಿಂಗ್ ಸಿಮ್ಯುಲೇಟರ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ವಿಜಯಕ್ಕೆ ಹೋಗಿ! ವೈವಿಧ್ಯಪೂರ್ಣೀಕರಣ, ವೇಗ ಮತ್ತು ಆಟ ನಿಮಗೆ…
short.ko: 엔진을 고치고 Kart Racing Simulator에서 승리하기 위해 경주하세요! 맞춤 설정, 속도 및 재미가 여러분을 기다리고 있습니다.
short.lt: Paleiskite savo variklius ir lenktyniaukite iki pergaloje su Kart Racing Simulator! Pritaikymas, greitis ir linksmybės jūsų laukia.
short.lv: Ieslēdziet savus dzinējus un sacīkstiet uzvarā Kart Racing Simulator! Pielāgošana, ātrums un jautrība jūs sagaida.
short.ml: നിങ്ങളുടെ എൻജിൻകൾ അടക്കുകയും Kart Racing Simulator-ലേക്ക് വിജയത്തിനൊപ്പം റേസ് ചെയ്യുക! കസ്റ്റമൈസേഷൻ, വേഗം, പിള്ളസമയം നിങ്ങളെ…
short.mr: आपल्या इंजिन्स चालवा आणि Kart Racing Simulator मध्ये विजयी होण्यासाठी धावा! सानुकूलन, गति आणि आनंद आपल्याला वाटताना.
short.ms: Nyalakan enjin anda dan perlumbaan ke arah kemenangan di Kart Racing Simulator! Penyesuaian, kelajuan, dan keseronokan menunggu…
short.nl: Start je motoren en race naar de overwinning in Kart Racing Simulator! Aanpassing, snelheid en plezier wachten op je.
short.no: Start motorene dine og kjør mot seier i Kart Racing Simulator! Tilpasning, fart og moro venter på deg.
short.pl: Włącz silniki i ścigaj się do zwycięstwa w Kart Racing Simulator! Dostosowanie, prędkość i zabawa czekają na ciebie.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Ligue os motores e corra para a vitória no Kart Racing Simulator! Personalização, velocidade e diversão esperam por você.
short.ro: Pornește-ți motoarele și concurează pentru victorie în Kart Racing Simulator! Personalizare, viteză și distracție te așteaptă.
short.ru: Заводите свои моторы и гоняйтесь к победе в Kart Racing Simulator! Настройка, скорость и увлечение ждут вас.
short.sk: Zapnite svoje motory a preteky na víťazstvo v Kart Racing Simulator! Prispôsobenie, rýchlosť a zábava na vás čakajú.
short.sl: Zagnite svoje motorje in se dirkajte proti zmagi v Kart Racing Simulator! Prilagajanje, hitrost in zabava vas čakajo.
short.sr: Upalite svoje motore i trkajte ka pobedi u Kart Racing Simulatoru! Prilagođavanje, brzina i zabava vas čekaju.
short.sv: Starta dina motorer och tävla mot seger i Kart Racing Simulator! Anpassning, hastighet och kul väntar på dig.
short.sw: Washa injini zako na shindana kwa ushindi katika Kart Racing Simulator! Kubadilisha, kasi, na furaha zinakungoja.
short.ta: உங்கள் எஞ்சின்களை இயக்கி கார்ட் ரேஸிங் சிமுலேட்டரில் வெற்றிக்கு ஓடு! தனிப்பட்டது, வேகம், மற்றும் பொழுது உங்களை காத்திருக்கின்றன.
short.te: మీ ఇంజన్‌ను రన్‌చేసి Kart Racing Simulatorలో విజయానికి వెళ్ళండి! కస్టమైజేషన్, స్పీడ్, మరియు ఆనందం మీకోసం కాదు.
short.th: เร่งเครื่องยนต์และแข่งขันไปสู่ความชนะใน Kart Racing Simulator! การปรับแต่ง, ความเร็ว และความสนุกกำลังรอคุณอยู่
short.tr: Motorlarınızı çalıştırın ve Kart Yarışı Simülatörü'nde zafer için yarışın! Özelleştirme, hız ve eğlence sizi bekliyor.
short.uk: Заводьте свої двигуни і гоньтеся до перемоги в Kart Racing Simulator! Налаштування, швидкість і розвага чекають на вас.
short.vi: Khởi động động cơ của bạn và đua đến chiến thắng trong Kart Racing Simulator! Tùy chỉnh, tốc độ và niềm vui đang chờ bạn.
short.zh_CN: 点火并在卡丁车赛车模拟器中赛车到胜利！定制、速度和乐趣等待着您。
short.zh_TW: 啟動您的引擎，在卡丁車賽車模擬器中賽車取勝！定制、速度和樂趣等待著您。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Get ready to rev your engines and embrace the thrill of high-speed kart racing like never before in Kart Racing Simulator! Strap into your virtual kart and prepare for an adrenaline-fueled gaming experience that will leave you breathless.

Features:

Realistic Kart Racing Physics: Kart Racing Simulator offers a true-to-life racing experience with physics that mimic the dynamics of real go-karting. Feel every turn, drift, and acceleration as you navigate the tracks with precision.

Customizable Karts: Customize your kart to suit your racing style. Modify your kart's appearance and performance to gain an edge on the competition. Experiment with different setups to find the perfect balance between speed and control.

Single-player: Immerse yourself in an engaging single-player campaign, complete with a compelling storyline and challenging objectives. Take on AI opponents and unlock new karts, tracks, and customization options as you progress.

Spectacular Graphics: Kart Racing Simulator boasts stunning graphics that bring the tracks and karts to life. Race through rain-soaked streets, vibrant forests, and sun-drenched beaches, all rendered in breathtaking detail.

Realistic Sound Effects: Hear the roar of your kart's engine, the screech of tires on the asphalt, and the cheers of the crowd as you zoom past. The immersive sound effects make you feel like you're right on the track.

Intuitive Controls: Kart Racing Simulator offers a user-friendly control scheme that's easy for newcomers to pick up and play while still providing depth for experienced racers.

Dynamic Weather: Experience the unpredictability of weather conditions that can dramatically affect the outcome of your races. Navigate through rain, snow, and sunshine as you adapt to the changing elements.

Kart Racing Simulator is the ultimate kart racing game that offers a thrilling combination of realism, competition, and excitement. Whether you're a casual gamer looking for a fun time or a hardcore racer seeking a challenge, Kart Racing Simulator has something for everyone. Get ready to experience the kart racing adventure of a lifetime!

HOW TO PLAY
You can move the kart with the arrow keys, space and W-A-S-D keys.

HOW TO INSTALL
Click download this Extension using the "Add to Chrome" button.

Once the game has finished loading, simply select the "Extensions Icon" button. 

After clicking this, you'll be directed to the playground area, where the game "Kart Racing Simulator" will launch automatically. All that's left is to press the play button and start enjoying the game.
